name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Devign - An automated issue reporting tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share issues with your team right from the website you're viewing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Issue reporting is inevitable, yet time consuming which takes up your most scarce resource—time. With Devign, you can discover, report, and share directly from your website / web product under 5 seconds—hassle free.

Run spell checks for your design by visual AI ‘Lumos’

🌐 www.devign.app
✉️ hello@deepbluedot.io
